item.title: 废除增税政策后，S&P 公司将肯尼亚的减税政策进一步推向深入
item.description: 在肯尼亚政府否决了旨在解决财政失衡问题的有争议的增税措施后，S&P 全球评级公司将肯尼亚的信用评级下调至垃圾级。【原文：S&P Global Ratings downgraded Kenya’s credit score deeper into junk after the government nixed controversial tax hikes meant to address fiscal imbalances.】

item.title: 对冲基金抛售柴油，供应过剩拖累期货市场
item.description: 投资者已转而严重看跌柴油，对柴油价格下跌的押注飙升至 2020 年初开始锁定以来的最高水平。【原文：Investors have turned deeply bearish on diesel, with bets on falling prices surging to the highest level since lock-downs began in early 2020.】

item.title: 对冲基金看涨黄金的赌注创四年新高
item.description: 货币经理们对黄金的看涨押注跃升至四年多来的最高点，原因是他们预期美联储将更早、更深入地实行货币宽松政策以刺激经济。【原文：Money managers’ bullish wagers on gold jumped to the highest in more than four years on expectations for earlier, deeper monetary easing by the Federal Reserve to bolster the economy.】

item.title: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔的支点推动了华尔街的全面反弹
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔发出了迄今为止最果断的信号，表明他已经完成了对抗通胀的使命，这有助于恢复市场秩序，而就在三周前，市场还陷入了自大流行病以来最严重的动荡之中。【原文：Jerome Powell’s most decisive signal yet that his inflation-fighting mission has been accomplished has helped restore order to markets that only three weeks ago were engulfed in the worst upheaval since the pandemic.】

item.title: 爱尔兰因公共财政和经济增长而上调信用评级
item.description: Scope Ratings 将爱尔兰的信用评级上调了一个等级，原因是该国公共财政状况良好，经济增长强劲。【原文：Scope Ratings upgraded Ireland’s credit rating by one notch, as it pointed to the nation’s strong public finances and robust economic growth.】

item.title: McKesson 正在洽谈佛罗里达癌症专科医院股份事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，麦可森公司（McKesson Corp. ）正在就收购佛罗里达癌症专科研究所（Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute）的控股权进行深入谈判，该研究所是一家私营肿瘤诊所运营商。【原文：McKesson Corp. is in advanced talks to buy a controlling stake in Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute, a privately-held operator of oncology clinics, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 勒布的 Third Point 增持苹果股票，但仍无法击败 S&P 500 指数
item.description: 据丹尼尔-勒布（Daniel Loeb）的 Third Point LLC 基金周五致投资者的一封信称，尽管该基金的旗舰基金持有一些表现最好的巨型科技股，但上季度未能跑赢 S&P 500 指数。【原文：Daniel Loeb’s Third Point LLC failed to beat the S&P 500 Index last quarter despite holding some of the best-performing megacap technology stocks in its flagship fund, according to a Friday letter to investors from the fund.】

item.title: C.D. 豪说：加拿大应重振实际回报债券
item.description: 据一个政策研究小组称，加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多的政府应考虑重新引入近两年前取消的通胀挂钩债券拍卖。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government should consider reintroducing auctions of inflation-linked bonds in Canada, which were canceled nearly two years ago, according to a policy research group.】

item.title: 以太币交易所交易基金上市一个月后，投资者对其接受程度缓慢
item.description: 备受期待的以太币 ETF 在美国推出已有一个月，但投资者似乎仍不太感兴趣。【原文：It’s been a month since the much-anticipated Ether ETFs launched in the US — but investors still don’t seem too interested.】

item.title: 纽约市戏剧学校因债券违约面临 14.5% 的利率损失
item.description: 一所在纽约和洛杉矶均设有校区的戏剧艺术学校因违反与市政债券持有人的协议而面临高达 14.5% 的利率处罚。【原文：A drama and arts school with campuses in New York City and Los Angeles is facing an interest rate as high as 14.5% as a penalty for breaching an agreement with its municipal bondholders.】

item.title: 工会发出罢工通知，加拿大铁路再陷瘫痪
item.description: 周五，就在火车重新开始运行几小时后，一个工会对加拿大最大的铁路公司发出罢工通知，这很可能会破坏重振重要航运网络的计划。【原文：A union filed strike notice against Canada’s largest railway on Friday just hours after trains began rolling again, likely derailing plans to revive vital shipping networks.】

item.title: 欧洲央行雷恩称通货紧缩和经济疲软是 9 月减息的后盾
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，通胀放缓和欧元区经济疲软增强了下月降低借贷成本的理由。【原文：The slowdown in inflation alongside weakness in the euro-zone economy strengthen arguments to lower borrowing costs next month, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 迈克-阿什利的女儿被任命为英国零售帝国总监
item.description: 迈克-阿什利（Mike Ashley）的一个女儿被任命为这位英国亿万富翁零售帝国的董事。【原文：One of Mike Ashley’s daughters has been appointed a director of the British billionaire’s retail empire.】

item.title: 开普敦获得国际金融公司 1.58 亿美元贷款用于基础设施建设
item.description: 南非开普敦市从世界银行私人投资部门获得了一笔 28 亿兰特（1.58 亿美元）的贷款，用于改善其供水、卫生和电力道路基础设施。【原文：South Africa’s City of Cape Town secured a 2.8 billion-rand ($158 million) loan from the World Bank’s private-investment arm to boost its water, sanitation, power road infrastructure.】

item.title: 受困于LME排队的交易商对仓库涨价怒不可遏
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所正在调查仓库运营商伊斯蒂姆金属公司（Istim Metals）大幅提高管理费的问题，此前该交易所收到了交易商的投诉，称成本增加给他们带来了压力，并加剧了铝市场的扭曲。【原文：The London Metal Exchange is looking into a sharp administrative fee hike at warehouse operator Istim Metals, after receiving complaints from traders who say the increased cost is putting them under pressure and fueling distortions in the aluminum market.】

item.title: 通胀放缓，欧洲央行准备下一次降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）官员大谈下个月再次降息的前景，他们将从通胀率正急剧向其目标回落的预测中得到鼓舞。【原文：European Central Bank officials talking up the prospect of another reduction in interest rates next month will take heart from forecasts suggesting inflation is plummeting back toward their target.】

item.title: 鸽派鲍威尔助推美元创 16 个月来最长跌势
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔确认央行将于下月降息的预期后，美元大跌，引发全球主要同业货币反弹。【原文：The dollar plunged after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell affirmed expectations that the central bank will cut interest rates next month, sparking a rally in the currencies of major global peers.】

item.title: 鲍威尔谈降息，全球股市创历史新高
item.description: 随着投资者从美国降息范围和缺乏衰退信号中获得信心，全球股市在收复早些时候动荡造成的损失后将创下历史新高。【原文：Global equities are set to close at an all-time high after recouping losses from the turmoil earlier this, as investors gain confidence from the scope of US interest-rate cuts and the lack of recession signals.】

item.title: 鲍威尔锁定 9 月降息赌局，国债反弹
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在杰克逊霍尔的讲话巩固了央行下月降息的预期，此后国债反弹。【原文：Treasuries rallied after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s speech at Jackson Hole cemented expectations that the central bank will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: Topgolf 因担心衍生产品 "来得太晚 "而遭双重降级
item.description: Topgolf Callaway Brands Corp.旗下同名高尔夫练习场销售下滑，债务负担沉重，可能会吓跑买家，这促使雷蒙德-詹姆斯（Raymond James）下调了该公司的评级。【原文：Slowing sales at Topgolf Callaway Brands Corp.’s namesake driving ranges and a hefty debt load that threatens to frighten off buyers spurred Raymond James to slash the company’s rating.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺称 9 月降息决定 "轻而易举
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）认为，欧洲中央银行下月降息的决定是直截了当的。【原文：The decision for the European Central Bank to lower interest rates next month is straight-forward, according to Governing Council member Mario Centeno.】

item.title: 英镑兑美元创两年多来最强水平
item.description: 英镑兑美元汇率攀升至 2022 年 3 月以来的最高水平，使英国货币今年以来的涨幅再创新高。【原文：Sterling climbed to its highest level since March 2022 against the dollar, adding to the British currency’s peer-beating gains this year.】

item.title: 鲍威尔释放降息信号，黄金扩大涨幅
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔发出降息时机已到的信号后，黄金延续涨势。【原文：Gold extended gains after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled that time has come for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储降息 "时机已到
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，美联储下调关键政策利率的时机已经到来，他肯定了官员们将在下个月开始降低借贷成本的预期，并明确表示他有意防止劳动力市场进一步降温。【原文：Chair Jerome Powell said the time has come for the Federal Reserve to cut its key policy rate, affirming expectations that officials will begin lowering borrowing costs next month and making clear his intention to prevent further cooling in the labor market.】

item.title: 速溶咖啡亲和力让罗布斯塔咖啡豆从 "后辈 "成为宠儿
item.description: 全世界对速溶咖啡的喜爱与日俱增，这使得咖啡烘焙商不得不继续依赖曾被咖啡爱好者冷落的罗布斯塔品种，即使价格达到了约半个世纪以来的最高点。【原文：The world’s growing love for instant coffee is keeping roasters reliant on the robusta variety once snubbed by java snobs, even as prices reach the highest in about half a century.】
